description: Ras el hanout brings out the sweetness of butternut squash in this simple middle eastern inspired lentil salad.
name: Spiced Butternut Squash, Lentil & Almond Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g butternut squash, peeled, deseeded and chopped
2 cloves garlic, peeled and minced, divided

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Toss the butternut squash with a tablespoon of oil, sprinkle over the ras el hanout and 1 minced garlic clove and mix well to coat. Roast for 25-30 minutes.
Cook the lentils according to pack instructions. Pour over the lemon juice, 1 teaspoon of zest, half of the chopped coriander and the remaining oil and toss to coat.
Whisk the yoghurt together with a pinch of lemon zest and the rest of the garlic. Tip the roasted butternut squash into the bowl with the lentils.
Serve with flaked almonds, lemon garlic yoghurt and chopped coriander on top.
